meanings.definition: A tool used to swat flies.
meanings.sent1: I grabbed the flyswatter to catch the pesky fly.
meanings.sent2: The flyswatter is hanging on the wall next to the door.
meanings.sent3: The flyswatter became a hero in our kitchen, saving us from the buzzing intruders.
meanings.sent4: Her swift hand with the flyswatter was like a ninja's strike against the flies.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the flyswatter made it easy to spot in the room.

meanings.definition: To use a flyswatter to kill flies.
meanings.sent1: She carefully flyswattered the fly on the window.
meanings.sent2: I will flyswatter the flies in the kitchen after dinner.
meanings.sent3: He flyswattered with such precision that the flies didn't stand a chance.
meanings.sent4: The way she flyswattered the flies was like a dance of death in the air.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the flyswatter hitting the flies echoed in the room.
